name: get_brandlist_by_siteid_zappos_1_6pm_2
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool zappos_2022.
Tool description: ZAPPOS NEW ENDPOINTS
API description: Retrieve the brand list from the Zappos or 6pm websites by site ID using the RapidAPI.

siteid.description: The site ID to fetch the brand list from (1 for Zappos, 2 for 6pm).
